comments:
Description:
    use "Value of this data" will get an error

Step to reproduce:
    1. new a datasource and dataset
    2. drop a single colmn in dataset to the layout view to get a data
    3. choose the data and go to the highlights
    4. when add a higligts choose "Value of this data"
